org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Pierce } ss
On Justice Circuit Tacoma Precinct Pierce County Washington Territory,
J.B. Burt. J. P. To the Sheriff and keeper of the jail of said count,

Whereas, Albert Tait has been ordered by this court to recognize with sufficient sureness to secure his appearance at the District Court for the 2nd Judicial District of Washington Territory at its next session, for the purpose of testifying in the case of the Territory of Washington vs. C.S. Case, and whereas said Albert Tait has refused to so recognize, therefore in the name of the United States, you are commanded to receive into said Jail & safely keep the said Albert Tait until he shall comply with the said order or be otherwise discharged according to law.
J.B. Burt Justice of the Peace --------------------
Thereby certify the foregoing to be a true and of the original commitment received by me Aug. 1st 1889 and now in my hands.
J.G. Price Sheriff of Pierce Co. Wash. Terr.
